title: Masato Yamasaki
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Yamasaki was born in <a href="Kitakyushu">Kitakyushu</a> on April 7, 1980. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Kyoto%20Sanga%20FC">Kyoto Purple Sanga</a> in 1999. However he could not play at all in the match until 2000. In 2001, he moved to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Mito%20HollyHock">Mito HollyHock</a>. He debuted in August and played many matches as substitute after the debut. From summer 2002, he became a regular player as left side midfielder. Although he played many matches in 2003, he was released from the club end of 2003 season. After 1 year blank, he joined <a href="Japanese%20Regional%20Leagues">Regional Leagues</a> club <a href="Giravanz%20Kitakyushu">New Wave Kitakyushu</a> based in his local in 2005. He played for the club in 2 seasons and retired end of 2006 season.
